column1: Annual Income and Expense of FDIC-Insured Commercial Banks and Savings Institutions
Trading liabilities and other borrowed money
Provision for loan and lease losses
Investment banking, advisory, brokerage and underwriting fees and commissions
Net gains (losses) on sales of loans
Net gains (losses) on sales of other real estate owned
Net gains (losses) on sales of other assets (except securities)
Amortization expense and goodwill impairment losses
Income (loss) before income taxes and extraordinary items
Net income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interests
Net income (loss) attributable to bank and noncontrolling interests
Number of institutions with year-over-year earnings gains

Prior to 3Q 2021, templates included highlighted items which did not include data for insured savings institutions that filed Thrift Financial Reports (TFRs). Current templates have been refreshed for all periods to include data from all insured institutions.
